thread.title: EPA spends millions on military-style weapons, watchdog group reports
thread.title_full: EPA spends millions on military-style weapons, watchdog group reports - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: EPA spends millions on military-style weapons, watchdog group reports
text: The Environmental Protection Agency has spent millions of dollars over the last decade on military-style weapons to arm its 200 "special agents" to fight environmental crime. Among the weapons purchased are guns, body armor, camouflage equipment, unmanned aircraft, amphibious assault ships, radar and night-vision gear and other military-style weaponry and surveillance ... ...
